title: Witbooi letter to German commander MCQ 1

content.prompt: Witbooi’s point of view in discussing his right to rule the Nama lands “by double conquest” is historically significant mostly because it illustrates how

choices.label: African political leaders learned to use effectively the European diplomatic discourse of sovereignty and state rights to ultimately forestall the advance of imperialism
interethnic conflicts in Africa led to political fragmentation and ultimately limited Africans’ ability to resist imperialism
European imperialism fostered among Africans a sense of belonging to new national units and ultimately led to nationalist resistance movements
some African leaders were able to play one European colonial power against another to ultimately preserve their lands from colonial infringement

topic.text: 6.3: Indigenous Responses to State Expansion from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
